* [ ] I have chosen a clean, descriptive **branch name based on the issue** (`username/issue-number`).
* [ ] I have chosen a clean **commit messages** with incluses a good representation of my actions/intent on the codebase (eg. Feature: commit message or Fix: commit message)
* [ ] I have linked this PR to a **GitHub Issue** in the SyncForge Project Board.
* [ ] I have performed a **self-review** of my own code before opening this PR.
* [ ] This PR includes sufficient **screenshots (frontend) or API samples (backend)** for the reviewer.
* [ ] I have confirmed the **GitHub Actions** (Linting/Tests) have passed.
